q.quote: There are no rules of architecture for a castle in the clouds.
q.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

q.quote: Architecture is a visual art, and the buildings speak for themselves.
q.author: Julia Morgan

q.quote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
q.author: Jim Rohn

q.quote: We shape our buildings; thereafter they shape us.
q.author: Winston Churchill

q.quote: Architecture should speak of its time and place, but yearn for timelessness.
q.author: Frank Gehry

q.quote: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
q.author: Coco Chanel

q.quote: All real education is the architecture of the soul.
q.author: William Bennett

q.quote: Architecture is the thoughtful making of space.
q.author: Louis Kahn

q.quote: I don't build in order to have clients. I have clients in order to build.
q.author: Ayn Rand

q.quote: Prose is architecture, not interior decoration, and the Baroque is over.
q.author: Ernest Hemingway

q.quote: We are called to be architects of the future, not its victims.
q.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

q.quote: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
q.author: Richard Bach

q.quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
q.author: Epictetus
